name: RRGGBB
description:
RRGGBB is a puzzle platformer with three characters of different colors, which are red, green, and blue.  These three colors never collide with each other, but they can still interact through other combined colors and mechanics.  Solve the puzzles in each level and reach the shared exit portal.

Controls:

Move: WAD or Arrow Keys

Switch: Down/Space/Enter

Reset: R

Back: Esc or B

Update 1:

Adjusted levels 7, 11, 15, and 18.
